website_summaries.verdict: Affordable yet well-made leggings designed in a slimming style.
pros: Consumers felt these leggings offered excellent quality for the cost, designed with light comfortable fabric that was soft and not too sheer
They also stand out for their vibrant colors and great fit
cons: A few felt these were thinner than expected, and some felt the sizing ran a little long

customer_reviews.title: I should have picked a different color
customer_reviews.text: The fit was great and the fabric was so soft. Unfortunately, I picked a bad color for my complexion (medium). It matches my skin tone too closely and looks like I don't have any pants on. I had to return because I basically could never wear these pants out of the house. If you are a darker complexion or even lighter the blush pink (rose pink) should be fine. I'll probably get these leggings again but in a different shade. I'm 5'6" 190.
customer_reviews.author: Veziah

customer_reviews.title: Don't risk it, you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Tricked by all these glowing reviews! I bought 3 pairs (here's hoping the other two are more sturdy) Very disappointed, the crotch seam has about 5 little holes forming around it and it's starting to separate after one wear. I'm not overweight, I'm a size 4/6 depending on the brand. I wore these on a walk in the park the day I received them, that was the most strenuous thing that occurred when I wore them. To be honest I really like the way they feel and fit but I sort of need my leggings to remain in one piece in order to give a good review >_<
customer_reviews.author: Erin D. Palmer

customer_reviews.title: So soft!
customer_reviews.text: These leggings are great for everyday wear. They are thick enough that you don't need to wear a long shirt to cover your butt if you don't want. They are SO soft, I always find myself touching them when I wear them. I am about 120lbs, 26in waist and 37in hips and I got the "one size".
customer_reviews.author: Shelby H.

customer_reviews.title: But I’m so glad I did they are super soft and not see ...
customer_reviews.text: I was scared to purchase these at first especially in white! But I’m so glad I did they are super soft and not see through which is the best. I loved them some much I ordered in grey and Mauve. I use they for everything. A cute outfit, around the house and even working out. Can't wait ro het every color!
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne

customer_reviews.title: See through but comfortable
customer_reviews.text: So I bought these legging based on the reviews that they aren’t see through but let me tell you these ARE definitely see through I was wearing black underwear so not so visible when standing normal but if you bend down the slightest you can see everything and don’t get me wrong they are super comfortable and soft and I would buy again but they need to be worn with a long shirt or sweater...I bought a plus size since I’m on the thicker side and it fit perfect!!! Put a paper towel inside to show how see through
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Little tiny holes all over the behind of them. Doesn’t give options to return.
customer_reviews.author: christina staskiewicz

customer_reviews.title: They are super stretchy and soft
customer_reviews.text: These are the softest things ive put on my legs in a long time haha. They are super stretchy and soft. I got camel toe a few times but a long shirt does the trick. The color is rich and the material is worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Tracey C.

customer_reviews.title: Overrated
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend didn't have to wear these long you know they weren't going to last. The seams along the crotch area are coming loose
customer_reviews.author: DaddyLovesBaby

customer_reviews.title: So in love with these tights!
customer_reviews.text: I'm officially obsessed with these tights! I am ordering them in every color. They are seriously the softest fabric I have ever worn and the sizing actually fit really well. I was a little worried about the sizing because I am typically an xs or small but these really couldn't have fit any better and they are so comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: Stretchy and see-through
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected. The material is very thin and stretchy, which makes them see-through. I felt uncomfortable when I tried them on. You can easily tell the material is very low quality. I’m returning them but only getting a partial refund. I would not recommend this item to anyone. I’m very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: MCZ19

customer_reviews.title: Hole after 1 wear!!!
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 6 so I ordered the one size. When they arrived I was pleased with how incredibly soft they were. Very similar to a well known legging brand at about half the price! They fit well and are super comfortable. However, after 1 wash, I was folding them and noticed a big hole in the crotch! How disappointing. Obviously poorly made. It's too bad bc I would have bought several more pairs.
customer_reviews.author: Jhall626

customer_reviews.title: I though for the price the reviews were too good to be true
customer_reviews.text: I though for the price the reviews were too good to be true, I was right. These are total garbage and completely see through, you will have no secrets with these leggings.
customer_reviews.author: Apples

customer_reviews.title: Order a pair in every color. For real.
customer_reviews.text: Holy crap, these leggings are amazing. Without exaggeration, they are the most comfortable item of clothing I've ever put on my body. I'm 5'10", about 200lbs, and I often find "one size" to be too short, but these fit down to my ankle. They're not exactly control top, but they do hold my bits in in a flattering way. The best part is, the top doesn't roll and they don't slide down. Keeping in mind I'm wearing them during winter, they also didn't make me sweat. I didn't want to take them off. I need to order a billion pairs, including a few to wear to bed.
customer_reviews.author: Avery T

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit, soft
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these!! Usually "one size" doesn't fit me. I'm 5'2 and 160 Ibs. Of course they're a bit long but I'm used to that and I can just flip them under which is easy cuz they're tights. So soft and not too thick or too thin. Honestly perfect for me. And tucks in my tummy alright.
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying these leggings for a couple of years and I love them. I was very happy to see the capri style in the plus size with the wide waist band. Very soft, perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: JessH

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and good fit
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful! Soft. I bought plus size and regular. They both fit fine. I am 5' 5" and weigh 166 lb. Could have just gone with the regular
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Navarro

customer_reviews.title: ... 200lbs I bought the one size and it fits like a glove
customer_reviews.text: Im 5’3” 200lbs I bought the one size and it fits like a glove. Never expected it to fit cuz i recieved it too small but it fit perfect w/o it being see through. Its soo soft & comfy im buying more.
customer_reviews.author: RenizaC

customer_reviews.title: Definitely SEE Through
customer_reviews.text: So these are definitely see through. I bought tan, brown and rose. As soon as i took them out I knew they weren't opaque. I put a pair on and yep you can see the color of my underwear, you dont even have to bend over too see the transparency. I'm 5'3" 130 lbs. They are comfortable and soft but a little long. Very thin not for winter weather. Its like a stretchy Tshirt material. If you have any imperfections (dimples, cellulite) it will show. I rec'd mines today and will be returning them tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: Toni B.

customer_reviews.title: Fit great!
customer_reviews.text: These are great, very comfy. Ive worn them twice. I followed the laundry instructions and they stayed perfect. I am 5'7" and have a 32 inch inseam and these are perfect. All the way down, not capris like most are on me!
customer_reviews.author: BrightJenn13

customer_reviews.title: The pros are that these are super soft and super light weight
customer_reviews.text: The pros are that these are super soft and super light weight. They are great under a dress with boots and will work wonderfully as a second layer under pants. The cons, I got the plus size and they run a bit small/are see through in the back side when worn (I wear a size 20 pant and carry most of my weight in my back side/hips/tummy). I also felt seams pop as I pulled them on, so they probably won't last that long. They do not fit high waisted on me, the sit just below my belly button and require pulling up through out the day.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Baughman

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable!!
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, super comfortable!! These feel like ultrasoft pajamas. They have no compression factor, so, whike they aren’t going to hold anything in, they aren’t tight or binding or uncomfortable AT ALL. The high smooth waistband keeps muffin top away. The fabric has a bit of a nap to it, almost like sueded microfiber, but very subtle. This one is better than the other Satina high waisted capri that has an elastic band in the waist. The fit is smoother. ****UPDATE**** I ordered more pairs so I could have more colors. I love these leggings!! I donated all my uncomfortable tight leggings and got more of these. lol
customer_reviews.author: J. Timpe

customer_reviews.title: So soft and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This leggings fit like a glove, is perfect fit not to large no to tight,the high waist stays in place not like others leggings they usually roll down if you don't have a flat stomach. I love the fact that the material is not shiny at all and is breathable ideal for working out and lounging on the couch. After I received my first pair I immediately bought one on each color I loved them. Just for reference I'm 5,4" and I weight 140 pounds, 32 inch waist, usually get medium size clothing or large depending on the item.
customer_reviews.author: diana

customer_reviews.title: A MUST HAVE
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these! I am a legging queen and these are the best I have ever worn. They too even my most expensive leggings!! They feel like butter on your skin. They're so comfortable and soft I could live in them. I ordered a small (which is what I usually order in leggings). I'm 5'8" tall and my measurements are 36" 28" 33.5". The leggings aren't super tight around my waist which is awesome and they aren't too loose either. Perfect fit. They even make my nonexistent booty have a little umph which is almost impossible to do lol. I need these leggings in every color !!!
customer_reviews.author: Okrr

customer_reviews.title: Super soft
customer_reviews.text: Got a pair of these free to try, but that doesn’t effect my review. These are super soft and really comfortable. The only thing I would say that is negative is the bottom of the leggings rolled a bit as the day went on. Wasn’t a big deal, just a little annoying to unroll them. But for the price they’re listed...they’re awesome!
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Holes on the first day
customer_reviews.text: These leggings are very soft and fit very well so I wanted them to work out but the first day I put them on there are tiny tears and holes next to the seam by my butt. It’s too bad because they really are very similar to Lula Roe leggings
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Cenicola

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I was extremely skeptical of these leggings considering they’re a “one size fits all” type of deal. I am 5ft 5in and curvier. I was worried they were going to be too tight or see through. However that’s not the case! They are not see through even after three washes so far. They are extremely soft and comfortable. The only thing I noticed is they are more of a muted black compared to some of my other leggings but it’s barely noticeable. I liked them so much I ordered a second pair. Def would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: nichole campton

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is not accurate and bad quality fabric
customer_reviews.text: Bought the plus size leggings and they are TINY. Fit more like a Medium! (I wear an XL/16 usually which isn't even really plus size but wanted a comfier fit). The fabric quality is terrible-thin and see-through. I was expecting something amazing based on all the positive reviews but I am so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: ShopGirl

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfy
customer_reviews.text: I am 5' 4 and 185lbs, 36 DD. After reading reviews I decided to get a XL. It is a little loose on me but I love it! It fits how I want it to in the waist and is a bit big in the boobs area. I would size down if you would like a tighter fit in the waist and breasts. The material is nice and soft! I would definitely recommend this shirt to my friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: AFwifey

customer_reviews.title: Soft and comfy
customer_reviews.text: So soft! I am a 16-18, 5 foot 1 for reference. I purchased these in the plus size and they fit great. When they say soft they are soft. I have these pants in black and they seem pretty opaque. They fit me right at the ankle and are definitely above my belly button (I do have a short torso so take that how you will). They do feel pretty thin which I truly love, but not sure how long they will last with regular laundering. I don't view these as workout leggings, just casual leggings. After I launder these a few times I will gauge as to whether to order more of these.
customer_reviews.author: Southernfae

customer_reviews.title: Soft and comfortable—update: wouldn’t buy again
customer_reviews.text: Pants are super soft. They’re mostly opaque, more opaque than most of my leggings. Washed once so far and they held up. The high waist is moderately really supportive. I do wish they came in a petite size; in 5’1 and 139lb (postpartum). Update: they now receive a one star rating because they’ve only been washed twice and I discovered a random hole on my left buttock. There was no known snag and it isn’t a snag at all. Just a hole. For now, I’ve spot repaired it with interfacing but I will never buy again.
customer_reviews.author: MrsH

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable but the seams tear easily
customer_reviews.text: These leggings are as comfortable as the other reviewers have noted. They are soft and have just enough stretch. Also, like other reviewers have noted, they are not the most durable. The second time I wore them, I guess I pulled them up too aggressively because the middle seam ripped before I had them on. I kinda expected that, from reading other reviews, so wasn't surprised and actually ordered a replacement pair that I will treat a little gentler.
customer_reviews.author: Fire100

customer_reviews.title: and these fit pretty decent for one size
customer_reviews.text: I wear size 2 jeans, and these fit pretty decent for one size.. They could be a bit smaller to fit my curves better, but overall not bad. The material is super soft..and since I travel a lot, hand wash, and quick dry material is best..which this is. I will wear with tunics, my nightie if it is cold, and if with shorter tops, I use a thong, cause it shows panty lines..
customer_reviews.author: Tania

customer_reviews.title: White is completely see-through
customer_reviews.text: Very very soft material and fit as expected. Unfortunately, the material for the white pair is completely see-through. Those are nude colored underwear in the pics - the pants also sport a black tag in the middle of the backside seem. If that’s the look you’re going for, these are for you. If you’re like me and there’s a good chance my grandparents will be walking behind me at some point and could not live down the mortification then these are definitely a hard pass. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: MNBastien

customer_reviews.title: Super stretchy. Great as maternity leggings. Great for weight fluctuations.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely soft material. Super stretchy. I bought these as an alternative to maternity leggings because I wanted to be able to wear them for a long time after I give birth. I am 5'5" and prefer my leggings to hit an inch or so above my ankle, so with these I can either pull them up further on my leg or roll them once to get that affect. there is a seam at top of waistband but it's not tight. I pulled my waistband a little to make thread pop and give it a little more stretch. I would highly recommend these leggings.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett Fontanez

customer_reviews.title: Love...Love it!! ♡♡♡
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't sure of the size to get but I went with the XL. It was a perfect fit. I'm 5'7" and 189lbs. I usually wear a LG 12/14 depending on where I buy. I absolutely love this top and can't wait to order more. The material is thin and light weight. ..great for this Texas heat. Hope my review will help someone. ♡♡♡
customer_reviews.author: Deedee

customer_reviews.title: otally love! I thought at first they were way too ...
customer_reviews.text: otally love! I thought at first they were way too high up but super flattering & I totally have a mom muffin top. I’m super curvy, 5’2 160lbs wear a size 12. Went with 0-12 and they fit perfect! Fabric is super soft and breathable & comfy just like reviews said. I’ll be buying more!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and super soft! The charcoal is VERY dark, as pictured, but when held near black is definitely not black, The fabric is as soft as butter and the waistband is so comfortable. Not see thru at all. I normally wear a L/XL and I ordered the plus size. They fit well.
customer_reviews.author: TX Angel

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly soft and stretchy!
customer_reviews.text: Being 5’11, it’s tough finding leggings that are long enough on me, especially when they’re “one size.” These leggings are the real deal. They’re incredibly fuzzy and soft, definitely the softest leggings I’ve ever worn. They’re thin (I’m thinking perfect for when it gets a bit warmer outside) and somehow super stretchy without ever being see-through. I’ll definitely be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: K M

customer_reviews.title: So soft!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome capital leggings. I bought one size fits all When I took them out of package, I was like this is a joke as they were so small looking. Once I tried then I was so wrong. They fit perfectly and they are soo very soft. I am a size 14 - 167 lbs. I just ordered another black pair. Very satisfied!! Also the are high waisted. You can't beat the price. I think if I give proper Washing and drying. They will last.
customer_reviews.author: SWEDES

customer_reviews.title: Look great fit great
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves these they fit her great she says there so comfortable and there so soft to the touch. Shes 5ft 5 and 135 pounds and they look awesome on her there made really well and she always turns heads whenever she wears them. would definitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Lucky Man

customer_reviews.title: Buy em all!
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’9, 165lbs and these leggings are bomb!! I bought my second pair and I’m purchasing more. They are soft and form fitting. Find my on Instagram if you have any questions @Tierra.The.Titan
customer_reviews.author: Tierra The Titan

customer_reviews.title: Super soft
customer_reviews.text: These leggings are EXTREMELY soft and very stretchy. I would not wear these working out but for lounging and running errands they're perfect. They do not "hold you in" whatsoever but they are very comfortable. I love the vibrant red.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Buell

customer_reviews.title: Super soft & comfy
customer_reviews.text: These leggings are some of the softest I've seen and they fit really well. I'm 5'4", 116 lbs and I have the small. They are a bit long, but not bad. When I opened the package there were some noticeable strings on the inside & out. Again, not bad, but since I received these for free I don't mind trimming the threads. I am giving them a 4 out of 5 stars simply because of the strings. Looking forward to wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: TacosMomma

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: They are super soft and stretchy feels like good material I’m glad I order a couple
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: The most comfortable leggings ever!
customer_reviews.text: When the package showed up I was very skeptical because it looked so small, and so did the leggings! Being a size 12 trying to lose weight I was nervous about being on the edge of the one size vs plus size, but I LOVE these leggings!! I have been struggling to find some decently priced comfy leggings since I still have a not so flattering mom tum. I will have to see how they hold up in the long run, but after wearing them just a few times they have quickly become my favorite leggings.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great as Exercise Tights
customer_reviews.text: These are lightweight like tights, rather than leggings. I am plan to use them for working out. I wear leggings to work but these are not substantial enough for the office. I like the high waist and softness. The charcoal is a light grey and the lilac is almost a mauve. I has hoping for a darker grey and more of a purple. I will keep the black ones and order more. I washed them in cold/delicate and hung them to dry and they seem fine. I am a size 4 or 6 in pants and usually buy a medium legging and these fit like a medium legging.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Thin but sooo comfy
customer_reviews.text: As it says in the title, the material is really thin. I feel kinda naked when I’m wearing them. But it’s completely opaque and, even though you can feel the breeze blowing by, you can’t see anything through the material. Fit is just right, I have a tummy and the waist doesn’t roll down. I like the selection of colors. I received this product at a reduced price for my honest review of the item.
customer_reviews.author: S. Boggia

customer_reviews.title: Same Size Shirts, Different Lengths
customer_reviews.text: I first ordered this shirt in black and loved how it fit, so I ordered another one in black and one striped. All the same size. As you can see by the photos they are all different lengths, even the two black ones are different lengths. What the heck?!?! Not happy at all. I originally was going to buy this tunic in other colors when they came back in stock but now I won't be.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica E.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these two months ago and decided just now that it would be appropriate to write a review. In short, I LOVE THESE! Everything about them is perfect - construction, fit, color, texture ... very comfortable to wear, do not slip or ride, full coverage fabric (none of that telltale see-through that I notice on other garments of this nature), and the color is true, deep and, apparently, fully saturated so that I do not anticipate fading over time. For the price, especially, I do not hesitate to give this product a whole-hearted positive recommendation.
customer_reviews.author: V. Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: White leggings that are NOT see through!
customer_reviews.text: Finally! White super soft capri leggings that aren't completely see through. I will wear these with long tunics but every pair I've tried is just too thin for my taste. I also like the higher yoga style waistband (reminds me of my fave lula leggings). I'll definitely be back for more colors!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I love this brands long leggings so I decided to purchase the Capri leggings. One of the legs is about 2 inches shorter than the other leg. A noticeable difference and it has driven me crazy all day. I got rid of the packaging or else I would return so I’ll probably just throw them away because they annoy me too much to wear again. Found another brand I’m going to try. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: CandyStore

customer_reviews.title: I will be ordering more
customer_reviews.text: This are extremely soft and very comfortable. I often do not trust items that are one size (I'm chubby) but these are nice and stretchy so I do think they will work for a lot of different sizes. I will be ordering these in more colors. The only reason they aren't 5 stars is they are fairly thin so I'm not sure how long they will last with a lot of wear and definitely need a long shirt over them. And will certainly not be warm enough at all during the colder months but I have lined leggings for that.
customer_reviews.author: EmyW

customer_reviews.title: SOFTEST LEGGINGS EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had read the reviews but really didn't think it was true. But OMG. These are SO soft. They don't have a fleece lining which is what I was looking for. They are completely opaque so no see through. But they are soft as a bunny. I swear. These have totally become my favorite leggings. I have already bought a dozen pair of different colors. The lilac gray is my favorite. These leggings are the best. To finish this up, I don't normally do reviews unless I am really impressed. These leggings impressed me. Try a pair and make up your own mind. I loved them. Oh. I got the plus size and I usually wear a 3X. No problems.
customer_reviews.author: HelloKitty

customer_reviews.title: Love this shirt!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this shirt! It's soft and true to color. It hugs my hips perfectly. I ordered a size Large, and it fits great. I am 5'2", 160 lbs, 36DD.
customer_reviews.author: Kori Howell

customer_reviews.title: Poor stitching and sizing
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than expected. It fits but is poorly made. I had bought different yoga high-waisted capri leggings that I loved & needed to replace; since they were out of stock, I tried these since they seem similar. Upon receiving it, I could see that they were not as stretchy as my other ones but I thought I'd try it anyway. Putting them on the first time, stitches in the waistband snapped. It fits, but too snugly. I wouldn't recommend these. Buy the ones from LMB instead.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: My favorite leggings!!
customer_reviews.text: I have two pairs (the dust purple and the black) and I LOVE them so much! They’re actually long enough to cover my ankles, very soft, and high waisted. They’re not sheer either which is hard to find in leggings. I plan to buy several more pairs. I am usually a 12 in pants and am 5’8. The plus size fits great
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: These leggings are the first to ever actually fit me in length. I'm 6 foot tall and usually end up with leggings that end in the middle of my calf, not these! They actually cover my ankle and I can still pull them down to under my heel without stretching them out. They are great to wear under jeans on super cold days. They are super soft and lightweight, add the perfect amount of warmth. Would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Vance

customer_reviews.title: Great tunic!
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'9 and so good tunics are difficult for me to find. This one is made out of a great material (soft, stretchy, made well, and washes well). I got a size large to be more roomy up top and I'm so glad I did! It fits perfectly on me (i usually wear a medium). This top would be so perfect for bustier ladies as well. My only complaint is that it doesn't come in more colors!
customer_reviews.author: Sid

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for the gym!
customer_reviews.text: I think these leggings are great! The olive color is exactly what I expected. And they're so soft!! I've has them for a few months now and still going strong! These leggings fit really well too after you break them in; they were slightly tight to begin with but now they're perfect. The regular one size fits all surprisingly fit me at 5'3" and 165lbs. I wear them to the gym and they stay up where they need to while doing cardio or yoga. The only down side is that you can see all the curves and dimples on my thick thighs, but that's life. I'm definitely buying more soon!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Burton

customer_reviews.title: Great leggigns
customer_reviews.text: As other reviewers have mentioned, these are SUPER soft. I feel like I’m barely wearing leggings when I have them on. They are somewhat opaque but that doesn’t concern me as I don’t typically wear leggings without a long shirt, etc. That said, if you are looking to wear them with a short shirt, I’d advise wearing black or skin-colored underwear. Also of note os that these aren’t super dark black. Since they are made of a material that is super soft and almsot velvety, they have more of a worn black appearance. Think LuLaRoe black. If you’re into matching your blacks, this may be an issue for you. That said, these leggings are wonderful and my new go to.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Cain

customer_reviews.title: My FAVORITE leggings
customer_reviews.text: At first, I was worried by the “one size.” (For reference, I’m 130lbs, 5’ 5”) They can easily be longer than I need them to be, but they don’t scrunch and look awkward when they’re pulled up from being too long. I now own 3 pairs of these and I’m not stopping! They are SO soft and comfortable and can be worn with literally anything. They’re even quite slimming! They are a bit thin, but not see through. I’ve tried several different leggings off of Amazon and these are the winners.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For the price, they're nice leggings
customer_reviews.text: They're definitely notttt my holy grail black opaque leggings from Old Navy. That said, they are very black, MOSTLY opaque (if you don't have a huge butt), and they fit well. The waistband isn't as supportive on my lower stomach as some other leggings I own, but all in all, I would say these are good leggings. It almost feels like you're not wearing pants, which is kind of nice. They're also very lightweight and very soft. I would imagine they don't last through many washes, but as cheap as they are... I think I could overlook that.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Hot for summer months.
customer_reviews.text: Material can feel hot at times, probably perfect for cooler weather. Can’t beat the price and they are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Completely see through - not even stand proof 😅
customer_reviews.text: As the saying goes you get what you pay for, I was tricked by some of the great reviews I heard about these. I’ve never been so horrified to squat in front of a mirror and see my bum just hanging out 🤷‍♀️ Theyre not in any way squat proof and tbh you could see a wee freckle I have on my bottom through them while standing - and they were big on so it’s not like they were stretched
customer_reviews.author: Ryley & Leanne

customer_reviews.title: Great fit! Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered wild ginger color and while they are a beautiful color I still don't know if they are reddish or brownish - lol! I really like the Sejora product line. They are affordable and high quality. I'm always iffy with the "one size" fits all but to my surprise they actually fit with no fat rolls. They are soft as to be expected by Sejora. I wear an 8/10 and they fit very comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: These leggings are IT!
customer_reviews.text: So today’s my first day wearing them can’t talk on how they hold up, HOWEVER these leggings are the most comfortable buttery soft flattering leggings I have! I ordered two more pairs! Want all the colors. Going to wait to see how they hold up! I’m 5’8 and weigh 180 although I look slimmer. I ordered the OS and they fit lovely. Glad I didn’t order bigger! I’m normally about a 12/14 in jeans or pants!
customer_reviews.author: Mommaof3boys

customer_reviews.title: STAINS EVERYTHING
customer_reviews.text: So these leggings definitly were not what I was expecting. They are not a legging material but have more of a soft cotton feel. Although it is not what I wanted they are really comfortable so I was going to keep them.... until I realized that they STAIN EVERYTHING! Everywhere I sat I left a trail of black behind me. It wasn't until I realized that my white toilet seat was completely black. I have tried everything to remove the stains. Bleach, porcelain cleaner, IT WON'T COME OFF! I rent my apartment so now I need a new toilet seat. I will be contacting the company and will update my review if they respond.
customer_reviews.author: Camille

customer_reviews.title: Definitely more snug than I had hoped, though still soft
customer_reviews.text: I am in my first trimester, so I'm not showing yet, but I constantly feel bloated. I thought ordering a pair of leggings might be a nice option, especially since it's still summer. I am normally a size 12, but I carry most of my weight in my chest and stomach. I got the "one size" of these, and they were VERY snug at the waist. I could wear them, but the top rolled down a little bit. That said, they are incredibly soft, and they were flattering. I'm going to exchange them for the plus size, just because I'm only going to get bigger, but they seemed like they'd be really comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: DianeTop Contributor: Calligraphy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Pair of Leggings!
customer_reviews.text: These leggings are just as I hoped! I was looking for leggings to wear under my dresses in the winter as I do not care for "tights" or "nylons." I have had several pairs in the past that didn't quite work. I didn't want fleece lined (too hot), I didn't want shiny texture, I didn't want them too long, etc. These are IT! They are soft and matte in color which mirror a "tights" look. They are so incredibly soft. They sit slightly above your waist line and do not roll down or bunch like tights often do. They are thinner (not heavily lined) but still warm under dresses. I love these and will definitely be ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: Australien

customer_reviews.title: Love the black pair, hate the "white" pair!
customer_reviews.text: I love love love the black pair that I received! Nice rich dark black color, fabric is not see-through, although nice and lightweight for summer. And, the product seemed fresh and new. Plan to wash cold on gentle and line dry. HOWEVER, the WHITE pair were horrible! Not even the same style and construction of the black pair, even though advertised as same! White capris arrived all stretched out, completely different waistband, and NOT a white color - looked like they had been put through the wash with BLACK clothes then returned to Amazon! Very disappointing and I sent them back!
customer_reviews.author: mamakat

customer_reviews.title: Best leggings ever
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical (as most are) that these wouldn’t fit right on me but I went through the reviews and figured that it couldn’t hurt to get some really soft leggings. These are seriously soft though guys!! Like nobody in their reviews are exaggerating. These kinda give my a camel toe but these are just the best leggings. They barely give you a camel toe and they just fit great, I love these leggings. Buy them y’all.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe

customer_reviews.title: a general disappointment
customer_reviews.text: The leggings themselves are ok in quality. They are thin, which means they can be worn under skirts and dresses as thick stockings...positive. I'm disappointed with the waist. There is a wide band, which is nice, but then there is this tiny elastic at the waist that just seems out of place and will not last long. It would have been much nicer if the full band was elasticized. I am also not happy with the company. I ordered 3 pair and after I had received notice of shipping, 2 of them were retracted. I was refunded, but no explanation was given. Did they not have the colors I selected? Were they damaged in transit? Just not good communication.
customer_reviews.author: Bbatalla

customer_reviews.title: Good loungewear but not made for the gym
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5”5 135 pounds got a one size. Fits great. The seams are very cheap and came already falling apart (I guess that’s to be expected with $10 leggings) I think these will be loungewear around the house they are extremely soft and comfortable just wish they were made just a tad better! Did not pass the squat test with the lavender color although it wasn’t too bad. Sweat is also noticeable with this color so beware gym people! While my review is a 3 star I will be buying again because like I said they are cheap and still comfortable for lounging in.
customer_reviews.author: katie

customer_reviews.title: Not that stretchy!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased based on good reviews. After receiving I tried them on. First impression the fabric is more rigid, not buttery soft. Not that stretchy. When stretched just to pull on, the fabric ripped causing a small hole to open, which eventually would have tore open further. When I went to take them off the seam along the waist was ripping as I had to pull and stretch them down. I could hear the stitches rip as stretched. I just had a baby and in between sizes 8/10 definitely not a os. No wear near the quality of my solid black LuLaroe. My $5 Walmart leggings are better quality. Do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: Carlson/Barrraza Family

customer_reviews.title: They are  the BEST capri leggings!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my THIRD pair, and I suspect I'll end up ordering every color!! They really are buttery soft, the high waist and wide waistband means you will not be dealing with a muffin-top or any sort of rolling down. They are light, but truly opaque, and very stretchy. I'm 5'1" and 155 and I chose to order the plus size because I didn't want, or need, them to be super form-fitting, or tight in any way, and for me they work perfectly. I haven't noticed any shrinkage when I've washed them, but I ALWAYS hang them to dry. If you're reading this review I suspect you're interested in buying some capri leggings~ try these, they're PERFECT!!
customer_reviews.author: CatWhiskers

customer_reviews.title: STOP! for the best leggings on AMAZON!
customer_reviews.text: I really love these leggings, they are made with great fabric!!!! I have the high waisted and elastic waistband version of these (capris). They don't ride up, wash excellent, no pilling, smooth fabric, breathable, so stretchy and not baggy AT ALL!!! If you are looking for the perfect workout leggings, around the house leggings, go to the store leggings, walk a dog leggings, ride a tractor leggings..... LOOK NO FURTHER!!! These are so versatile, I've washed them so many times and wear them over and over again! I have the full length version as well and they are exactly the same just down to my ankle!
customer_reviews.author: MollyB

customer_reviews.title: runs large- very soft
customer_reviews.text: i ordered navy, these are soft and great quality, but they do run big. I am a size 6/8 athletic build, and i have a ton of room in these. They will work fine though, i just wanted them for lounging around. Cheaper and better than some name brand leggings i own.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie A.

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed!
customer_reviews.text: I live in these leggings! They are the first ever leggings that are not only true to size, do not roll down and wash well, but also they are not see through! Hurrah! I have so many pairs of these as I use them for workouts and for wearing daily. I wear them in the winter as an under garment for extra warmth and I live in them through the summer with tunics as they are so much cooler than jeans or jeggings when its hot outside. Love these and cannot recommend enough! Five Stars!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect leggings!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely soft, opaque, and gorgeous color. I am traveling to the Middle East soon and need leggings that are light and breathable yet covering, and these absolutely deliver. I purchased the lilac grey leggings and they are exactly the shade I was expecting from the image. Very beautiful and I will be purchasing another pair in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not even one wear and there's a hole... UGH!
customer_reviews.text: I put them on and wore them for maybe 5 hours and discovered there was already a hole in the upper inner leg. I may be able to fix it, but for less than a day's worth of wearing, I shouldn't have to. The leggings themselves are super soft, fit even my curvy body pretty decently (thought the opening against my calves is rather snug). Just a warning though - if you are any sort of curvy at all you will need to wear these under a skirt or long tunic top, because they fit like a second skin and definitely show off EVERYTHING!
customer_reviews.author: ladydragon_fyre

customer_reviews.title: Dye rubs off badly
customer_reviews.text: Here’s the thing, they fit great and they’re Sssoooooooo comfy. HOWEVER the dye keeps rubbing off and getting onto my skin. It started clogging my pores and making them black (not blackheads. I mean actually black dye). Also, it’d dyed my butt so much, that it rubbed off onto the toilet seat and won’t come off! That’s so ridiculous! After 2-3 washes it finally stopped doing this. But I’m still pretty bitter that the toilet seat has an imprint of my buttcheeks...
customer_reviews.author: Paige_

customer_reviews.title: So soft & comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Super cute , soft & fits well for a one size item !! Felt like I had pjs on! Really impressed so far but I haven’t worn them outside of trying them on so I’ll update later. I almost look naked in the dusty rose color so I’ll be getting a different color next time lol
customer_reviews.author: Emily Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Crap
customer_reviews.text: Piece of crap leggings, they ripped the first day I wore them.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen4019

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite yoga pant
customer_reviews.text: Well these came in the mail today and I have to say they are my new favorite yoga pants..Ladies! They are not see through!!! They are super soft! They have a thick band and are high waisted. They meet all the requirements of the perfect yoga pants. The only con is they are one size fits all but they fit me great. I’m a smaller human BUT I can tell they would fit someone much bigger than me too.
customer_reviews.author: Leisa

customer_reviews.title: Not a good fit
customer_reviews.text: I just got these today. The black is a washed out shade of black. Not a true black at all. I purchased the plus size and before I even tried them on I knew they'd be too small. They barely went up my behind. They were skin tight like pantyhose. Also, too long. I double checked the tag and it did state it was plus size. The good, the material feels strong and very soft. The waist band is nice and doesn't dig in. For reference, size 18. I don't think these are for petite or curvy women.
customer_reviews.author: RemyJax

customer_reviews.title: Like them
customer_reviews.text: For the price, they are like the soft types (not cotton, but soft material). I got XL just in case I usually am a size 9/10 to 11/12 depending on which fat month I'm having (lol). Honestly I wear mediums in everything usually, but I didn't want it tight or to show underwear. It was a good choice but waist is high and it can roll down because I probably need to buy a one size, but comfy. I'll try a one size when I drop ten lbs again in a different color and review that later.
customer_reviews.author: B. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Blue Fit, Black Didn't
customer_reviews.text: So first the good: I tried on the blue one and it is 100% true, Soft, doesn't show underwear, and SUPER comfortable. Perfect for Hot summer days. Doesn't ride up or down like a lot of leggings. Now for the unfortunate: I got the Blue and the Black. I just tried the black leggings on yesterday and noticed it was WAY to tight in the right leg and the seam was off. It looks like on leg was stitched smaller than the other. Really unfortunate as I love these leggings. Will try to get a replacement. If all goes well, definitely recommend, but if not, save your money. Will update soon.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Crassweller

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy. Literally falls apart at the seams.
customer_reviews.text: Bought a couple pair in different colors. They are so cheaply made. Literally falling apart. All of them!! Seams came apart on one pair before I even got them up past my knees. The seams in every pair I bought came apart the first time worn. I bought plus size because some reviews said they ran small. That wasn’t the problem. Fit ok. Just cheaply made. Not worth the money. Threw them away.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: So soft and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I have a big booty and the size I got fit perfectly. I needed a pair of leggins for a work trip that were casual yet comfortable. I ended up feeling very comfortable wearing them in public and they have not worn out or become faded after multiple washings. They are very soft and flexible. They are not a body shaper so if you are looking for something to hold in your belly, booty or jiggly legs, this is not the pair for you. However, the softness of them can't be beat.
customer_reviews.author: romarosie

customer_reviews.title: They are good quality and I like the soft texture
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised by these leggings. They are good quality and I like the soft texture. A lot of leggings you see on amazon from these overseas sellers at this price point won't last past a couple of washings, these are really nice. The only downside which is a personal thing, is that they aren't as tight as I would like for that "cinch" feel to thighs and waist, but I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: StarBright

customer_reviews.title: Great price and soft but not compression style
customer_reviews.text: The color MAUVE is awesome and highly recommend it. These leggings are very soft and not thing or see though and fit great BUT they definitely should be worn with a tunic or something that covers past the crotch and upper thigh. The inner thigh is NOT flattering as it is loose like those leggings u find, but for the price it’s amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Smith

customer_reviews.title: Love these cute
customer_reviews.text: Love these cute, soft stretchy wide ban waist. I bought two colors. I'm 5'5 and weigh about 145, and usually wear a size 10. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Sweetie Pie

customer_reviews.title: tye-dyed? ??????
customer_reviews.text: I'm going to give this blouse 4 stars because when I opened the package, the first thing I noticed was 2 very faint berry colored stains on the right side. Well, I love the style of this blouse. I ordered 1size up. The color I purchased is mint. Beautiful color for spring and summer! I'm hoping I can get the dye stains out with shout it out. If not, I'm still going to wear it out with a skirt or capri's. I will be ordering more of these. Fabric is so soft and it breathes! Love the fact that it has dolman sleeves. Just beautiful and easy to wear!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I can't stop wearing these
customer_reviews.text: These are a great value for the money! They are super soft, opaque, and fit very well. The sewing/seams appear to be done very well. In the last month I've probably worn these 20 times or more and I tore a tiny hole in the thigh with my nail, but other than that they've been great. I can't stop wearing them, so I am ordering a second pair. They are one size fits all and they fit me snug but not super tight which I love. They fit my waist perfectly and are not too long either. I have larger thighs and they are still opaque as they are stretched. For reference I am 5ft 2in and 140lbs. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: More like tights than leggings
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5"11 and 150 pounds. These fit fine. Are high waisted on me. They aren't see through. Super soft and comfortable. They fit and feel more like tights than leggings. I wear leggings almost every day. These make me feel almost too naked. They are super close to the skin. No they aren't see through or too tight. Just form fitting. I personally am only comfortable wearing these at home or out with a dress or super long shirt. I would order these again though as tights.
customer_reviews.author: JOY

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunate Sizing
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is buttery and just as soft as my favorite Lulu Lemons; however, the “one size” option just isn’t sufficient and is too long for me (5’4, size small) and feels a bit oversized in a way that might cause a camel toe situation. And the soft fabric doesn’t feel as tight and athletic as more expensive options. I’ll wear these to bed and maybe with an oversized sweater and booties in the Fall. However, they’re useless for hiking or yoga. 90 Degrees by Reflex leggings are a way better option.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: I like them!  Only improvement I can see is decreasing the price.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered Light Gray, plus size. I am 5’6” & weigh abt 210 lbs & typically wear 2x or 16-18 size & carry my weight fairly evenly but definitely bottom-heavy. I have concerns regarding leggings regarding cutting into my fleshy calves & showing every dimple :/ and these leggings pass each of these markers. They do show dimples but I will manage with long tunics. They’re soft & satiny & should work well under tunics & shorter dresses.
customer_reviews.author: D. Roark

customer_reviews.title: Money very well spend. These fit and feel amazing
customer_reviews.text: Silky! Feel so good when I wear them thinner than regular leggings but I knew that when I ordered them just didn’t realize how great they’d feel!! Fit exactly like they should have and as ordered. If you wanna feel good treat yourself to these! I bought 2pairs to start off with but now I want more and I wear nothing but leggings year round. So I know my leggings and these are amazing
customer_reviews.author: TexasLadyPirate

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I got these leggings in white to go under an Alice in Wonderland costume, they are perfect for what I was looking for, superr soft and stretchy, comfortable waistband (doesnt dig in or roll), however, forewarning the white is QUITE see through (i have a tattoo on my thigh and you can see every line) for reference I am 5'4" 155 lb and I believe I am toward the max size to fit the "one size" so it may be less see through in plus size or on a smaller frame, this is no problem because I plan to wear them under a knee length dress and despite that fact I will still most likely order these in other colors
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Bingham

customer_reviews.title: So great I bought 4 more pairs
customer_reviews.text: These are brilliant: breathable, opaque leggings with a comfortable waist that causes no muffin top. My measurements are 36" hip and 28" inseam and there is room for them to stretch and not be stretched-out. So far they have been great for lounging, sleeping, and working out.
customer_reviews.author: deepThoughts

product_meta.title: SATINA High Waisted Leggings - 25 Colors - Super Soft Full Length Opaque Slim
feature_bullets: 💟 YOUR NEW GO-TO FASHION PIECE - The SATINA High Waisted Leggings are a must have. The high waisted waistband comfortably hugs everything in for that sexy hourglass shape. You can also move freely about knowing that the high waistband will keep your leggings in place and avoids any unwanted sagging. And with so many ways to style these leggings you’ll find yourself reaching for these time and time again!
💟 CAN YOU SAY BUTTERY SOFT?! - The SATINA “peachskin” fabric is the softest material around. Strut your stuff in style while experiencing the highest level of comfort.

💟 FOR ALL SIZES AND BODY TYPES - These high waisted leggings are made with plenty of stretch to fit all sizes. Choose One Size if you typically wear a size Small to Large and choose Plus Size if you wear size X-Large to XXX-Large. If you’re not sure, order both sizes and try them on at home. We will walk you through how to return the extra pair for a full refund ;)

💟 LOW MAINTENANCE WASH & DRY - Simply throw your leggings in the wash with like colors and tumble dry low. These leggings are made to last so you can wear them over and over (we know you’ll want to!).

💟 GET READY TO BECOME A RAVING FAN OF SATINA - We know how precious your time and energy are, so we here at SATINA believe in providing top notch customer service that makes your shopping experience with us easy and stress-free. Our Customer Happiness Team won’t rest until you’re satisfied, so know that you’re purchasing from a company you can trust. See why countless customers rave about our customer service! *
